title: Requires that a fixed percentage amount of school district budgets shall be dedicated and utilized solely for classroom expenses
summary: Requires that a fixed percentage amount of school district budgets shall be dedicated and utilized solely for classroom expenses; authorizes the commissioner of education to define the term "classroom expenses".

                                    January 5, 2011

       Introduced  by  Sen.  MARCELLINO  -- read twice and ordered printed, and
         when printed to be committed to the Committee on Education

       AN ACT to amend the  education  law,  in  relation  to  requiring  fixed
         percentages  of  school  district  budgets  to  be  used for classroom
         expenses

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The education law is amended by adding a new section 1527-a
    2  to read as follows:
    3    S  1527-A.  SCHOOL BUDGET CLASSROOM EXPENSES.  1. FOR PURPOSES OF THIS
    4  SECTION, THE COMMISSIONER IS HEREBY AUTHORIZED AND DIRECTED  TO  PROMUL-
    5  GATE  RULES  AND REGULATIONS TO DEFINE THE TERM "CLASSROOM EXPENSES" AND
    6  TO IDENTIFY THOSE EXPENSES AT A SCHOOL DISTRICT WHICH SHALL  QUALIFY  AS
    7  CLASSROOM EXPENSES.
    8    2.  BEGINNING  WITH  THE  TWO  THOUSAND  TWELVE--TWO THOUSAND THIRTEEN
    9  SCHOOL YEAR AND EVERY SCHOOL YEAR THEREAFTER, THE SCHOOL DISTRICT BUDGET
   10  FOR EACH SCHOOL DISTRICT IN THIS STATE SHALL, AT A  MINIMUM,  PROVIDE  A
   11  FIXED  PERCENTAGE  AMOUNT  OF  SUCH  BUDGET  THAT SHALL BE DEDICATED AND
   12  UTILIZED FOR CLASSROOM EXPENSES WITHIN SUCH SCHOOL DISTRICT, AS FOLLOWS:
   13    A. FOR THE TWO THOUSAND TWELVE--TWO  THOUSAND  THIRTEEN  SCHOOL  YEAR,
   14  SUCH  FIXED  PERCENTAGE  AMOUNT SHALL BE SIXTY-FIVE PERCENT OF THE TOTAL
   15  SCHOOL DISTRICT BUDGET;
   16    B. FOR THE TWO THOUSAND THIRTEEN--TWO THOUSAND FOURTEEN  SCHOOL  YEAR,
   17  SUCH  FIXED  PERCENTAGE  AMOUNT  SHALL  BE  SEVENTY PERCENT OF THE TOTAL
   18  SCHOOL DISTRICT BUDGET; AND
   19    C. FOR THE TWO THOUSAND FOURTEEN--TWO THOUSAND FIFTEEN SCHOOL YEAR AND
   20  EACH SCHOOL YEAR THEREAFTER,  SUCH  FIXED  PERCENTAGE  AMOUNT  SHALL  BE
   21  SEVENTY-FIVE PERCENT OF THE TOTAL SCHOOL DISTRICT BUDGET.
   22    3.  ANY  SCHOOL  DISTRICT  WHICH PROVIDES LESS THAN THE REQUIRED FIXED
   23  PERCENTAGE AMOUNT FOR CLASSROOM EXPENSES SET FORTH IN SUBDIVISION TWO OF

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04406-01-1

       S. 925                              2

    1  THIS SECTION FOR ANY SCHOOL YEAR SHALL  INCREASE  THAT  PORTION  OF  ITS
    2  BUDGET DEDICATED AND UTILIZED FOR CLASSROOM EXPENSES BY A MINIMUM OF TWO
    3  PERCENT  EACH  YEAR UNTIL SUCH SCHOOL DISTRICT IS IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE
    4  REQUIREMENTS OF THIS SECTION.
    5    4.  IF  ANY SCHOOL DISTRICT IS UNABLE TO COMPLY WITH THE PROVISIONS OF
    6  THIS SECTION FOR ANY SCHOOL YEAR, SUCH SCHOOL DISTRICT MAY APPLY TO  THE
    7  COMMISSIONER  FOR  A WAIVER FROM THE PROVISIONS OF THIS SECTION FOR SUCH
    8  SCHOOL YEAR. UPON A FINDING BY THE  COMMISSIONER  THAT  SPECIAL  CIRCUM-
    9  STANCES  EXIST  THAT  JUSTIFY SUCH NONCOMPLIANCE, THE COMMISSIONER SHALL
   10  GRANT SUCH WAIVER FOR SUCH SCHOOL YEAR. SUCH WAIVER SHALL  BE  RENEWABLE
   11  ON  A  YEAR  TO  YEAR BASIS UPON A FINDING BY THE COMMISSIONER THAT SUCH
   12  SPECIAL CIRCUMSTANCES CONTINUE TO EXIST.
   13    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring fixed percentages of school district budgets to be used for classroom expenses
